Package Ramsim.Alu

Class Alu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ramsim.Alu.Alu
  • public class Alu
extends java.lang.Object
    Core class of the RAM Simulator. Implements the actual workload of the RAM Machine, connecting all the componentes together and fetching and executing the instructions from memory.
    Since:
    2019-02-25 e-mail: alu0101015255@ull.edu.es

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ACC  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Alu​(Memory<java.lang.Integer> dataMemory, java.util.ArrayList<Opcode> programMemory, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> tags, InputUnit input, OutputUnit output, boolean debug)
      The constructor takes as an argument a list of all the components that interact with the Alu.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void cycle()
      Simulates the two phases of a Cpu cycle: Fetching and Execution
      void fetch()
      Fetch from memory the instruction pointed by the IP, and increment the IP it after that.
      void halt()
      Ask the alu to halt, stopping all execution
      boolean isHalted()  
      void printDebugState()
      Group of statements that print information about the inner state of the Alu and its componentes
